name: 疯狂的坦克
description:
Crazy tank is a one-man adventure game.You can gain diamonds by controlling tanks, killing enemies and completing a number of achievements.Unlock new tanks with diamonds, and upgrade tanks.If you like to play with your friends, there's also a two-player mode where you and your friends can play each other fairly.Better game experience in the crazy tank.
1: there are 4 tanks and one original tank in the game.
2: tanks can be upgraded in the game, making them more powerful.
3: there are 24 maps, 20 levels and 4 chicken eating levels in the game.
4: you can choose double play mode, and play with good friends to see who is more powerful operation.
5: each level will randomly generate 5 VLCS.
6: randomly generate 5 resistant boss tanks per level (more and more). Take chances to kill them.
7: the last enemy in each level becomes a super boss.
8: in flight state, press K to adjust the perspective (keyboard), and move up and down to adjust the perspective (mouse).
9: in all scenarios, press the space to pause the game, and you can choose to go back to the main page or play again.P key to switch view.
10: : escape kill small game, want to kill the enemy, as long as the head hit fly it.
11: bubble big chaos fighting small game, press the Z key can jump in situ (on the ground).
